title: Double Life

description.plain:
Pharrell Williams’s “Double Life” is a main song from the official soundtrack of the animated comedy film Despicable Me 4 (2024), the fourth installment in the Despicable Me franchise. This song centers around the franchise’s protagonist Gru, who, while living under his fake identity alongside his family as part of a witness protection program, is blackmailed (by his new neighbours' teenage daughter, Poppy Williams) to take part on a heist to steal the mascot of Lycée Pas Bon, which is additionally the high school Gru attended.

The song has met positive feedback, though it also has been speculated to secretly be a diss song towards Canadian rapper Drake, who has currently received various accusations of pedophilia following the release of “Not Like Us” by American rapper Kendrick Lamar, which is a diss song towards Drake made during the current feud between the rappers.

embed_content: Read “Double Life” by Pharrell Williams on Genius

Pharrell Williams’s “Double Life” is a main song from the official soundtrack of the animated comedy film Despicable Me 4 (2024), the fourth installment in the Despicable Me franchise. This song centers around the franchise’s protagonist Gru, who, while living under his fake identity alongside his family as part of a witness protection program, is blackmailed (by his new neighbours' teenage daughter, Poppy Williams) to take part on a heist to steal the mascot of Lycée Pas Bon, which is additionally the high school Gru attended.

The song has met positive feedback, though it also has been speculated to secretly be a diss song towards Canadian rapper Drake, who has currently received various accusations of pedophilia following the release of “Not Like Us” by American rapper Kendrick Lamar, which is a diss song towards Drake made during the current feud between the rappers.
